original_text:
Age Of The Gods: Ruler Of The Dead
L’ultima novità di casa Playtech è Age Of The Gods Ruler Of The Dead, una slot che ci farà nell’Ade, il regno degli inferi abitato da creature mostruose e personaggi bizzarri!
Tema e grafica
La Playtech con questa nuova slot si rifà al mito di Persefone, figlia di Zeus e di Demetra, che fu rapita dallo zio Ade e portata nell’Oltretomba per diventare sua sposa. Qui le venne offerto un melograno, ignorando il fatto che accettare frutta nel mondo dei morti l’avrebbe costretta a restare in quel luogo per l’eternità. Demetra si lamenta con Zeus e raggiunge un compromesso: Persefone rimarrà all’inferno tanti mesi quanti erano i chicchi di melograno mangiati, sei in tutto, e i restanti mesi li avrebbe passati sulla terra insieme alla madre Demetra, dea della fertilità e dell’agricoltura. È così che nacque la primavera e l’estate.
Age Of The Gods Ruler Of The Dead è ambientata naturalmente negli Inferi, sul fiume Stige e a farla da padrone è il colore rosso. Una grafica mozzafiato e una musica evocativa rendono l’atmosfera carica di tensione. nella parte bassa della griglia si trovano i tasti per settare al meglio la nostra scommessa, dal numero di linee al valore della puntata, le vincite, l’Autoplay e la modalità Turbo.
Caratteristiche della slot
Le linee di pagamento attive sono 25, disposte su una griglia 5X3. La puntata minima è di 0,05 €, quella massima 500 €. Il tasto turbo accelera la rotazione dei rulli, mentre con l’Autoplay si possono impostare un numero di giri automatici compreso tra 5 e 100. Il valore RTP è pari al 96,53%.
Simboli e funzionalità
In Age Of The Gods Ruler Of The Dead troviamo simboli di basso valore come quelli legati alle carte da gioco e quelli di valore più alto, come l’elmo greco, il melograno, Persefone, Ercole e Ade.
Tra i simboli speciali, ci sono ben due Wild, Caronte e Cerbero. Essi sostituiscono tutti i simboli, tranne gli altri simboli Wild e possono comparire anche impilati, attivando due funzioni speciali:
Caronte, il traghettatore di anime, attiva la partita Bonus del gettone. In questo livello extra è possibile bloccare la rotazione dei rulli e tutte le monete oro, rame e argento vengono raccolte. La moneta oro paga 0,8x la puntata, la moneta argento 0,4x, quella argento 0,2x.
Se appaiono due o tre Wild impilati di cui almeno uno è Caronte, si avrà diritto a un moltiplicatore compreso tra 3x e 5x.
Il simbolo Wild del Cerbero impilato invece moltiplica la vincita della partita sino a un massimo di 5x.
Age Of The Gods Ruler Of The Dead partecipa anche al Jackpot Ages of God a cui sono collegate le slot di questa serie. Ci sono 4 livelli di Jackpot: Power, Extra Power, Super Power e Ultimate Power. Gli importi che possono essere vinti vanno da un minimo di 50 € (Power) a un massimo di 100.000 € (Ultimate Power).

raw_translation.response:
Age of the Gods: Ruler of the Dead

Playtech's latest addition to their portfolio is Age of the Gods: Ruler of the Dead, a slot game that takes us to the underworld, a realm inhabited by monsters and bizarre creatures!

Theme and Graphics

With this new slot game, Playtech draws inspiration from the myth of Persephone, daughter of Zeus and Demeter, who was kidnapped by her uncle Hades and taken to the Underworld to become his bride. Here, she was offered a pomegranate, unaware that accepting fruit in the land of the dead would force her to stay there for eternity. Demeter complains to Zeus, and eventually, they reached a compromise: Persephone would spend as many months in the underworld as there were pomegranate seeds eaten, a total of six months, and the remaining months with her mother Demeter, the goddess of fertility and agriculture. Thus, spring and summer were born.

Age of the Gods: Ruler of the Dead is naturally set in the underworld, on the River Styx, and the dominant color is red. Stunning graphics and evocative music make the atmosphere tense. At the bottom of the grid, there are buttons to set our bets, from the number of lines to the bet value, winnings, autoplay, and Turbo mode.

Slot Features

There are 25 active pay lines arranged on a 5x3 grid. The minimum bet is €0.05, and the maximum is €500. The Turbo button speeds up the rotation of the reels, while Autoplay allows you to set a number of automatic spins between 5 and 100. The RTP value is 96.53%.

Symbols and Functions

In Age of the Gods: Ruler of the Dead, there are low-value symbols like those associated with playing cards and higher-value symbols like the Greek helmet, pomegranate, Persephone, Hercules, and Hades.

Among the special symbols, there are two Wilds, Charon and Cerberus. They replace all symbols except the other Wild symbols and can also appear stacked, triggering two special functions:

Charon, the ferryman of souls, activates the Bonus Token round. In this extra level, you can lock the rotation of the reels, and all gold, copper, and silver coins are collected. The gold coin pays 0.8x the bet, the silver coin 0.4x, and the copper coin 0.2x.

If two or three stacked Wilds appear, of which at least one is Charon, you are entitled to a multiplier between 3x and 5x.

The stacked Cerberus Wild symbol multiplies the win of the game up to a maximum of 5x.

Age of the Gods: Ruler of the Dead also participates in the Age of God Jackpot, which is linked to the other slot games in this series. There are four Jackpot levels: Power, Extra Power, Super Power, and Ultimate Power. The amounts that can be won range from a minimum of €50 (Power) to a maximum of €100,000 (Ultimate Power).

response.headline: Theme and Myth
response.content:
If you're looking for a blast of mythological fun, then Age Of The Gods: Ruler Of The Dead has got you covered. This slot game is inspired by the Greek myth of Persephone, who was abducted by her uncle Hades and taken to the underworld. But don't worry, you won't be trapped down here forever, you'll be able to enjoy this game's excellent graphics and exciting gameplay.

The designers have really captured the essence of the underworld. The sound effects and visuals are top-notch and are sure to give you a spine-tingling experience. You'll feel like you're right there, deep in the earth, waiting for the next round to begin. We're not sure if you're in Tartarus or Hades' palace, but one thing is certain - you're going to have a great time.

The game is packed with thrilling symbols, each one portraying the game's mythological theme. You'll see the Greek helmet, which was used during the ancient times to provide protection to its wearer during battle. There is also the pomegranate, which has become symbolic of death and the underworld. Fans of Greek mythology will also be excited to see the heroic Hercules and the beautiful Persephone. Finally, let's not forget the titular character himself, Hades, who is a menacing presence on the reels.

Overall, Age Of The Gods: Ruler Of The Dead is definitely a must-try for anyone who is fascinated by the Greek mythos. The designers have put in a lot of effort to make this game truly immersive, and it clearly shows. So, grab a pomegranate, put on your Greek helmet, and get ready for an underworld adventure like no other!

Review: Age of the Gods: Ruler of the Dead
The latest release from Playtech is Age of the Gods: Ruler of the Dead, a slot that takes us into the underworld of Hades, inhabited by monstrous creatures and strange characters!
Theme and Graphics
With this new slot, Playtech draws on the myth of Persephone, daughter of Zeus and Demeter, who was abducted by her uncle Hades and taken to the underworld to become his bride. Here she was offered a pomegranate, oblivious to the fact that accepting fruit in the world of the dead would have forced her to stay there for eternity. Demeter complains to Zeus and strikes a compromise: Persephone will stay in the underworld for as many months as there were seeds of the pomegranate eaten, six in all, and the remaining months she would spend on earth with her mother Demeter, goddess of fertility and agriculture. Thus, spring and summer were born.
Age of the Gods: Ruler of the Dead is set naturally in the underworld, on the river Styx, and the color red dominates. Breathtaking graphics and evocative music make the atmosphere charged with tension. In the lower part of the grid are the buttons to set our bet, from the number of lines to the value of the stake, the wins, Autoplay and Turbo mode.
Slot Features
There are 25 active paylines, arranged on a 5X3 grid. The minimum bet is €0.05, the maximum €500. The turbo button accelerates the rotation of the reels, while with Autoplay you can set a number of automatic spins between 5 and 100. The RTP value is 96.53%.
Symbols and Functionality
In Age of the Gods: Ruler of the Dead, we find low-value symbols such as those related to playing cards and higher-value symbols such as the Greek helmet, pomegranate, Persephone, Hercules, and Hades.
Among the special symbols, there are two Wilds, Charon and Cerberus. They replace all symbols except the other Wild symbols and can also appear stacked, activating two special functions:
Charon, the ferryman of souls, activates the token bonus game. In this extra level, you can stop the rotation of the reels and all gold, copper, and silver coins are collected. The gold coin pays out 0.8x the stake, the silver coin 0.4x, and the copper coin 0.2x.
If two or three stacked Wilds appear, of which at least one is Charon, you are entitled to a multiplier between 3x and 5x.
The stacked Cerberus Wild symbol, meanwhile, multiplies the game's winnings up to a maximum of 5x.
Age of the Gods: Ruler of the Dead also participates in the Ages of God Jackpot, which is linked to the slots in this series. There are 4 levels of jackpot: Power, Extra Power, Super Power, and Ultimate Power. The amounts that can be won range from a minimum of €50 (Power) to a maximum of €100,000 (Ultimate Power).

        Review: Age of the Gods: Ruler of the Dead
The latest release from Playtech is Age of the Gods: Ruler of the Dead, a slot that takes us into the underworld of Hades, inhabited by monstrous creatures and strange characters!
Theme and Graphics
With this new slot, Playtech draws on the myth of Persephone, daughter of Zeus and Demeter, who was abducted by her uncle Hades and taken to the underworld to become his bride. Here she was offered a pomegranate, oblivious to the fact that accepting fruit in the world of the dead would have forced her to stay there for eternity. Demeter complains to Zeus and strikes a compromise: Persephone will stay in the underworld for as many months as there were seeds of the pomegranate eaten, six in all, and the remaining months she would spend on earth with her mother Demeter, goddess of fertility and agriculture. Thus, spring and summer were born.
Age of the Gods: Ruler of the Dead is set naturally in the underworld, on the river Styx, and the color red dominates. Breathtaking graphics and evocative music make the atmosphere charged with tension. In the lower part of the grid are the buttons to set our bet, from the number of lines to the value of the stake, the wins, Autoplay and Turbo mode.
Slot Features
There are 25 active paylines, arranged on a 5X3 grid. The minimum bet is €0.05, the maximum €500. The turbo button accelerates the rotation of the reels, while with Autoplay you can set a number of automatic spins between 5 and 100. The RTP value is 96.53%.
Symbols and Functionality
In Age of the Gods: Ruler of the Dead, we find low-value symbols such as those related to playing cards and higher-value symbols such as the Greek helmet, pomegranate, Persephone, Hercules, and Hades.
Among the special symbols, there are two Wilds, Charon and Cerberus. They replace all symbols except the other Wild symbols and can also appear stacked, activating two special functions:
Charon, the ferryman of souls, activates the token bonus game. In this extra level, you can stop the rotation of the reels and all gold, copper, and silver coins are collected. The gold coin pays out 0.8x the stake, the silver coin 0.4x, and the copper coin 0.2x.
If two or three stacked Wilds appear, of which at least one is Charon, you are entitled to a multiplier between 3x and 5x.
The stacked Cerberus Wild symbol, meanwhile, multiplies the game's winnings up to a maximum of 5x.
Age of the Gods: Ruler of the Dead also participates in the Ages of God Jackpot, which is linked to the slots in this series. There are 4 levels of jackpot: Power, Extra Power, Super Power, and Ultimate Power. The amounts that can be won range from a minimum of €50 (Power) to a maximum of €100,000 (Ultimate Power).
